name: Four (Andrei Rudenko)
description:
Small platformer puzzle game, made for ludum dare 36

Collect all elements to complete the level.

Movement:
left : A / LEFT
right : D / RIGHT
jump : SPACE / Z / W / UP
pause : ESC
restart : R

select level: Q / E

Tools:

Engine: Luxe

Language: Haxe

Sound: Ableton (NI Reaktor player + awesome community instruments)

LD36 game link
